instruction: What is the history and purpose of a book Club?
output:
Book clubs have existed since the 19th century as a means of sharing, discussing, and enjoying literature, educational texts, and other works of art. They are often made up of members of the same gender, although some book clubs are created specifically for mixed gender memberships. 
The purpose of a book club is to serve as a social outlet for members to interact and discuss the topics or themes presented in the book. Additionally, many book clubs also provide educational opportunities, where members may explore topics more deeply or develop opinions on cultural aspects present in the book. Book clubs may also serve as a form of entertainment, through hosting events, games, or social gatherings related to the books selected.

instruction: What is the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on travel and transportation?
output:
The COVID-19 pandemic has had a major impact on travel and transportation. Governments and health organizations around the world have imposed various restrictions on travel, which has resulted in a drastic decrease in air travel and other forms of transportation. Airlines in particular are significantly affected as people have stopped travelling for fear of exposure to the virus. 
It is also expected that these restrictions and travel decreases will have a long-term effect on the economy. There is a possibility of airline bankruptcies, cable car lines and train routes closing, and businesses such as hotels, restaraunts, and tourism companies suffering. Additionally, the pandemic could potentially lead to the introduction of new travel regulations and impact the future of international travel.

instruction: What is the benefit of using a neural network for computer vision tasks?
output: Neural networks have been increasingly used for computer vision tasks. The main benefit of using a neural network for this task is that it can take an input image and automatically recognize patterns based on the learned parameters. This allows it to accurately classify the image into its respective categories. Additionally, a neural network allows for scalability and can easily adapt to varying inputs. It is also more efficient compared to other approaches. Furthermore, neural networks are able to generalize well and perform well on unseen data, which is important for real-world applications.

instruction:
Convert the following SQL query into MongoDB query.

SELECT * FROM movies WHERE year >= 2000
output: db.movies.find({ year: { $gte: 2000 } })

instruction: What are the principles of effective public speaking?
output:
The principles of effective public speaking are:
• Prepare thoroughly – know your material and practice, practice, practice.
• Engage your audience – be energetic, sincere, and maintain eye contact with your audience.
• Use visual aids to illustrate key points – aids can be anything from hand gestures to slides.
• Speak to the back of the room– make sure your voice is heard in the back of the room.
• Remain passionate – show your enthusiasm for the material.
• Make sure the material is relevant – keep the material up to date with current topics and issues.
• Identify the “take home” message– make sure your audience knows your main point.
• Finish strong – tailor the close of your speech to the overall feel of your speech.

instruction: What is the difference between mutable and immutable objects?
output: Mutable objects are objects that can be changed. That is, the object's state can be modified after it is created. Examples of mutable objects are lists, dictionaries, and sets. Immutable objects, on the other hand, cannot be changed. Once an object is created, its state cannot be modified. Examples of immutable objects are strings and numbers.

instruction: How many protons are in Neon?
output: Neon has 10 protons. It is located in the 8th group of the periodic table and its atomic number is 10.

instruction:
Summarize this article in three sentences.

Input: https://www.vox.com/2015/7/16/8962643/Gender-neutral-pronouns
output: Gender-neutral pronouns are terms that don’t specify male or female, like "they", "ze" or "ey". This idea has been around for decades as an effort to create an inclusive language that doesn’t exclude anyone, however recently it has grown in popularity. Gender-neutral pronouns are becoming more widely accepted and used in the community, and they are a tool to promote understanding and respect while addressing someone.

instruction: Come up with a solution to this puzzle: Two cats are in a room. One of them is white and the other is black. How do you separate them without relying on sound or sight?
output: One solution to this puzzle is to place two identical bowls at each end of the room. Place a few pieces of food in one bowl and leave the other bowl empty. Both cats will be attracted to the bowl with food, leading them to separate across the room. Additionally, any other method that relies on scent or pheromones would work, such as placing a few drops of scented oil on the opposite ends of the room.

instruction: Classify the plant as a pine tree.
input: The plant had needle-like leaves that were about 3 inches long.
output: Yes, the plant is classified as a pine tree due to its needle-like leaves that are about 3 inches long.

instruction: List 3 characteristics of an elephant.
output: An elephant has thick skin, long tusks, and a trunk. It is also a herbivore, typically lives in small family groups, and can weigh up to 6 tons.

instruction: List five types of commonly used spices
output: Five types of commonly used spices are ginger, cinnamon, turmeric, cumin, and paprika.

instruction: Name one type of physical exercise
output: One type of physical exercise is running.

instruction: Suggest a way to store apples for a longer shelf life
output: The best way to store apples for a longer shelf life is to keep them in a cool, dark, and dry place. A temperature between 30-35°F (1-2°C) is optimal. To preserve the natural moisture, place the apples in a breathable container or wrap them in paper towels before putting them in the refrigerator.

instruction: Write an ad for a new food delivery service
output: Tired of the same take-out options? Looking for something new and delicious? Try New Food Delivery, the perfect solution for all your eating needs! We offer a wide range of food from restaurants around town, delivered straight to your door in a matter of minutes. With our selection of fresh, delicious, and high-quality meals, you'll never have to worry about a boring dinner again.

instruction: Explain the following proverb "Honesty is the best policy"
output: This proverb means that it is always best to be honest and truthful. Honesty means being open and genuine, even if it would be easier or more beneficial to be deceptive. Being honest with others will lead to mutual respect and trust, while lying can lead to serious problems. Being honest can also lead to feeling better about oneself, as it is never enjoyable to have to keep track of one's own lies.

instruction: Identify the main opposition to Candace Owens
output: The main opposition to Candace Owens is the Democratic party. The Democratic party is largely critical of her views on racism and other social issues.

instruction: Suggest a fun activity for an evening with friends
output: An evening with friends can be made more enjoyable with a game of charades. Charades is a game that is perfect for any size group, that encourages friendly competition and laughter. Players can take turns acting out clues for each other to guess, or teams can be formed and points can be awarded for each successful guess.

instruction: Categorize the given animal into its class.
output: The Gorilla is a mammal belonging to the order Primates. It is the largest living primate species.

instruction: What is the setting of the novel Heart of Darkness?
output: Heart of Darkness is set in the late 19th-century Congo Free State during the period of European imperialism. It tells the story of Marlow, a seaman and wanderer recounting his physical and psychological journey up the Congo River in search of the infamous ivory trader Kurtz.
